TopicTitle: Strut issues and more in SPH.

Articles.Content:
I have recently run into a bug within .90- When I build something in the SPH several things happen- for one the struts bug out and place on invisible objects... Another thing is that the symmetry placement is off as it places a doubled part on the same part hovered on rather than its duplicate on the other side-

I do not know if either of these run into the VAB as I am testing now...

Is there a patch or something already released for this?

Hmm... Well the symmetry thing you speak of might be the way the current system works (maybe not?). There are a lot of options you can activate, symmetry around a part being one of them. And I'm not sure what you're talking about with the struts.

Perhaps a couple pictures would help out?

Cheers,

~Claw

Hmm... Well the symmetry thing you speak of might be the way the current system works (maybe not?). There are a lot of options you can activate, symmetry around a part being one of them. And I'm not sure what you're talking about with the struts.

Perhaps a couple pictures would help out?

Cheers,

~Claw

Hmm- I'll find some pics.
Ugh- ofc I build something to make the bug happen and it works PERFECTLY... I'll see if I can get you anything.
It's the new radial/mirror symmetry thing, if it's not placing parts the way you want just press "R"

It's the new radial/mirror symmetry thing, if it's not placing parts the way you want just press "R"

Oh well that might help thanks Sal_vager .

Wait, so when you place struts, the game automatically replaces them with invisible parts? Is that what you mean?

As for your symmetry problem, yeah I have the same thing happening to me. Super annoying!
